thread.title: Serena Williams shocks players on public tennis court - CNN.com
thread.title_full: Serena Williams shocks players on public tennis court - CNN.com

author: cnn
title: Serena Williams shocks players on public tennis court - CNN.com
text:
Story highlights World No. 1 surprises two tennis fans Asks to play with them on public court Posts footage on social media account (CNN) Many tennis fans might wonder how they would fare playing against the world's best.
Yet few expect to be challenged during a friendly match on a public court. Follow @cnnsport That's exactly what happened in San Francisco on Sunday when 23-time time grand slam champion Serena Williams asked two unsuspecting recreational tennis players if she could share a court with them. The exchange was captured and published on Williams' Snapchat account. "Just having a stroll at night and I'm thinking about asking these guys if I can hit with them just to see their reaction," the world No. 1 can be heard saying as she approaches the court. Read More JUST WATCHED Serena Williams wins record 23rd major Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH 
Serena Williams wins record 23rd major 01:03 READ: Ball dogs are back READ: Federer to play on until 2019 READ: Tennis star loses Twitter bet, takes fan on date READ: Serena announces engagement Understandably, the reaction was one of shock. "Holy crap," one of the men can be heard saying. Williams was welcomed onto the court but, because she didn't have tennis shoes with her, ended up playing in a pair of knee-high boots. Visit cnn.com/tennis for more news and videos The moral of the story? "You never know when I could be coming to a tennis court near you," Williams said.
